pages.title: Cabbage White
pages.text: Pieris rapae is a small- to medium-sized butterfly species of the whites-and-yellows family Pieridae.$(br2)The caterpillar of this species, often referred to as the "imported cabbageworm", is a pest to crucifer crops such as cabbage, kale, bok choy and broccoli.

pages.title: Cabbage White
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
